2074.subject: HPWE
2074.descrlong: A hands-on class that incorporates the four components of self-defense: awareness, avoidance, and verbal and physical techniques. Teaches verbal and physical self-defense skills from a standing position and from the ground. Essentially a rape-prevention course that aims to reduce fear and empower students with skills to defend themselves against physical, verbal and sexual attacks. Credit/no credit. (Offered every semester.)
